about.summary: circuits is a Lightweight Event driven and Asynchronous Application Framework for the Python Programming Language with a strong Component Architecture

name: circuits
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set name = "circuits" %}
{% set version = "3.2" %}
{% set sha256 = "b2fad9be2235f87480c194efc91eaeed3cb030c465d4697f1ca326ce3619bf9b" %}

package:
  name: {{ name|lower }}
  version: {{ version }}

source:
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/{{ name[0] }}/{{ name }}/{{ name }}-{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: {{ sha256 }}

build:
  noarch: python
  number: 1
  script: "{{ PYTHON }} -m pip install . -vv"

requirements:
  host:
    - python
    - pip
    - setuptools_scm
  run:
    - python
    - setuptools

test:
  imports:
    - circuits

about:
  home: http://circuitsframework.com/
  license: MIT
  license_family: MIT
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: 'circuits is a Lightweight Event driven and Asynchronous Application Framework for the Python Programming Language with a strong Component Architecture'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - daniel88ferreira
    - abloemert
